frontmatter.title: Becoming a Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)
frontmatter.description: I’ve recently switched careers, from being a product engineer to a site reliability engineer (SRE). I’ve become Buffer’s first SRE this year and learned a lot from my experience. I want to share everything I’ve learned along the way, as well as the challenges I faced.
